job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
DevOps / Site Reliability Engineer (Remote) | Market-displacing Company Ready for Takeoff

 

Are you a DevOps Engineer or Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) with cloud-based and containerization experience? Are you an SRE or DevOps Engineer who has used common DevOps tools and has experience monitoring, alerting, and logging issues? Are you a DevOps or SRE who can jump into unfamiliar code to review and write when necessary? If so, this DevOps/SRE role may be for you!

 

This company is experiencing an incredible growth period. During 2020, their usage grew by 22x and their deployments grew by 12x—and that momentum is not slowing down this year. Not only is this company fully backed with over $40m raised, but they are also the only venture-backed company in their market. They are poised to dominate and displace an antiquated market, and they are expanding their DevOps team with fully remote positions to help make that happen. This is a unique opportunity for a DevOps Engineer or SRE to get on board right as the ship takes off!

 

What You’ll Need

Experience with container orchestration tools or platforms (preferably Kubernetes)

Experience with cloud-based development and applications (preferably AWS and/or GCP)

Experience storing and retrieving data in document-oriented databases (preferably MongoDB)

Experience using DevOps tools (like Grafana and Prometheus), as well as DevOpS platforms (like GitLab)

Experience with pull requests and reviewing, writing, and deploying code (preferably Typescript or JavaScript)

Experience operating in a continuous integration, continuous delivery (CICD) environment

Experience in Agile product development, sprint workflows and processes, and team velocity tracking

Experience working and managing client issues both inside and outside of the company

Experience responding to emergencies that require researching, fixing, and future-proofing issues

Experience in an on-call DevOps/SRE environment and swiftly responding to incidents

 

Bonus Skills (Not Required)

The Atlassian stack (JIRA, Confluence, OpsGenie)

AWS EKS, ECS, Faregate

DataDog

 

What You’ll Be Doing

Collaborating with cross-departmental teams to determine where improvements can be made

Working with teams to prepare for worst-case scenarios and document recovery plans

Owning and performing real-time observation, monitoring, alerting, and logging

Working with and managing client issues both inside and outside of the company

Taking on issues quickly and efficiently, as well as discovering and fixing the root causes

Learning and jumping into unfamiliar code and understand it well enough to help troubleshoot

Coordinating and releasing changes into production environments

Wearing multiple DevOps/SRE hats in a startup environment

 

What You’ll Get

Extremely competitive salary and equity

Amazing benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision)

Unlimited paid time off and sick time

Work from home (Fully Remote)

 

If you are a DevOps Engineer or Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) with experience in AWS/cloud, Kubernetes/containerization, as well as use in other DevOps tools, apply today!
